channel.title: House hearings on public broadcasting
channel.description:
A report on the House Commerce Committee hearings on the Public Broadcasting Act of 1967.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Public Broadcasting Act of 1967, part one
item.description: This program presents the first part of a report on the House Commerce Committee hearings on the Public Broadcasting Act of 1967. Includes an interview with John Gardner, Secretary of Health, Education and Welfare.
item.dc:creator: Greenwood, Bill
item.dc:subject: United States--Politics and government

item.title: Public Broadcasting Act of 1967, part two
item.description: This program presents the second part of a report on the House Commerce Committee hearings on the Public Broadcasting Act of 1967.
item.dc:creator: Greenwood, Bill
item.dc:subject: United States--Politics and government
